column4: im using virtualbox ose and i dont think my graphic card drivers installed on it. i ran the setup and it didnt work. any suggestions?

no like my graphic card drivers. the virtual box operating system is windows 7 im trying to use it to play some game and i dont think its going to work because my under device manager it states vga driver
how do install that?
you won't have much luck in running games in virtualbox
and you can't do that
virtual machines do not have access to the hardware
gfx card?
his radeon hd 5770 pro
11.04 has the latest ati driver release already, and no you can't do anything for it :)
if you don't need games, open driver runs unity/compiz etc pretty smoothly
but you can forget about the games with it
whats open driver?
the one you get when you don't enable proprietary driver from 'additional drivers' dialog :)
so wait if uninstall propiertary dirvers it wil run beter?
it should, compiz at least
what about like running videos and stuff on the web and 3d aprehensive things
games will be bad, at least
what games do you play on your distro and what distro is best for gaming?
warsow and quakelive mainly
warsow wont install idk y i click on it and nothing happens
download unified zip from warsow.net, and chmod +x warsow warsow.i386 warsow.x86_64
and run ./warsow
thats complicated haha
well, or select those files in file manager, 2nd click properties and checkbox 'allow executing' :)
